Dear Trankr
I am sorry for the delay in submitting my com¬
ments concerning KWAX proposal* It is difficult for me to
evaluate this series inasmuch as I have never heard Dr* Castell’s
program. Nevertheless, I know of the high record in which he
is held by so many members of the NAEB* On that basis I would
suggest that a series of thirteen 15-minute programs be planned
with approximately four programs for each of the sub-headings
set forth in Starlin’s letter*
If an expanded series of any one of these three
subjects seems warranted it could be planned for the future. In
other words, these thirteen programs would be an omnibus package
with the MORALIST, PURITANISM and EDUCATION tonics as sub-series.
With all best wishes.
Cordially yours.
Bernard R. Buck
Program Director
